Question: This person was still modeling for Outdoor Life and appearing on the cover of the magazine each year.
Hints: In September 2007, this person told talk show host Ellen DeGeneres that she was engaged.
For a time, she was known as this person Lee (or Pamela Lee) after marrying Mötley Crüe drummer Tommy Lee.
This person's Playboy career spans four decades (1989–2011), and she has appeared on more Playboy covers than anyone else.
